name: Limit Break Collector's Edition (Final Fantasy Commander Precon Decklist)

main.name: Cloud, Ex-SOLDIER
main.oracle_text:
Haste
When Cloud enters, attach up to one target Equipment you control to it.
Whenever Cloud attacks, draw a card for each equipped attacking creature you control. Then if Cloud has power 7 or greater, create two Treasure tokens.

card.name: Tifa, Martial Artist
card.oracle_text:
Melee (Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each opponent you attacked this combat.)
Whenever one or more creatures you control with power 7 or greater deal combat damage to a player, untap all creatures you control. If it's the first combat phase of your turn, there is an additional combat phase after this phase.

card.name: Secret Rendezvous
card.oracle_text: You and target opponent each draw three cards.
card.flavor_text: "Ok, I'm going to just go ahead and say it..."

card.name: Cloud's Limit Break
card.oracle_text:
Tiered (Choose one additional cost.)
• Cross-Slash — {0} — Destroy target tapped creature.
• Blade Beam — {1} — Destroy any number of target tapped creatures with different controllers.
• Omnislash — {3}{W} — Destroy all tapped creatures.

card.name: Elena, Turk Recruit
card.oracle_text:
When Elena enters, return target non-Assassin historic card from your graveyard to your hand. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)
Whenever you cast a historic spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Elena.
card.flavor_text: "Looks like talking alone won't cut it. You're going to have to feel some pain!"

card.name: Cid, Freeflier Pilot
card.oracle_text:
Equipment and Vehicle spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Jump — During your turn, Cid has flying.
{2}, {T}: Return target Equipment or Vehicle card from your graveyard to your hand.
card.flavor_text: "I'm Cid—that's who the hell I am! Now just let me handle it!"

card.name: Heidegger, Shinra Executive
card.oracle_text:
At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature you control gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of Soldiers you control.
At the beginning of your end step, create a number of 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens equal to the number of opponents who control more creatures than you.

card.name: Helitrooper
card.oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever this creature attacks, another target attacking creature gains flying until end of turn.
Equip abilities you activate that target this creature cost {2} less to activate.

card.name: SOLDIER Military Program
card.oracle_text:
At the beginning of combat on your turn, choose one. If you control a commander, you may choose both instead.
• Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.
• Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two Soldiers you control.

card.name: Ultimate Magic: Holy
card.oracle_text:
Permanents you control gain indestructible until end of turn. If this spell was cast from exile, prevent all damage that would be dealt to you this turn.
Foretell {2}{W} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

card.name: Clever Concealment
card.oracle_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Any number of target nonland permanents you control phase out. (Treat them and anything attached to them as though they don't exist until your next turn.)

card.name: Austere Command
card.oracle_text:
Choose two —
• Destroy all artifacts.
• Destroy all enchantments.
• Destroy all creatures with mana value 3 or less.
• Destroy all creatures with mana value 4 or greater.

card.name: Bastion Protector
card.oracle_text: Commander creatures you control get +2/+2 and have indestructible.
card.flavor_text:
"Squad A will set up here and search for
suspects. B will establish a perimeter—roadblocks included. Contain the situation!"

card.name: Bronze Guardian
card.oracle_text:
Double strike
Ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)
Other artifacts you control have ward {2}.
Bronze Guardian's power is equal to the number of artifacts you control.

card.name: Dispatch
card.oracle_text:
Tap target creature.
Metalcraft — If you control three or more artifacts, exile that creature.
card.flavor_text:
"I'll take the chopper! The bikes are all
yours, Cloud!"
—Barret Wallace

card.name: Puresteel Paladin
card.oracle_text:
Whenever an Equipment you control enters, you may draw a card.
Metalcraft — Equipment you control have equip {0} as long as you control three or more artifacts.

card.name: Unfinished Business
card.oracle_text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield, then return up to two target Aura and/or Equipment cards from your graveyard to the battlefield attached to that creature. (If the Auras can't enchant that creature, they remain in your graveyard.)
card.flavor_text: "If you're gonna pick a fight with the Turks, you'd better be prepared to leave in a body bag."

card.name: Vanquish the Horde
card.oracle_text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature on the battlefield.
Destroy all creatures.
card.flavor_text:
"Sir! A mass of high-density energy is
heading towards Midgar!"
—Shinra operator

card.name: Zack Fair
card.oracle_text:
Zack Fair enters with a +1/+1 counter on it.
{1}, Sacrifice Zack Fair: Target creature you control gains indestructible until end of turn. Put Zack Fair's counters on that creature and attach an Equipment that was attached to Zack Fair to that creature.

card.name: Yuffie, Materia Hunter
card.oracle_text:
Ninjutsu {1}{R} ({1}{R}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)
When Yuffie enters, gain control of target noncreature artifact for as long as you control Yuffie. Then you may attach an Equipment you control to Yuffie.

card.name: Ultimate Magic: Meteor
card.oracle_text:
Ultimate Magic: Meteor deals 7 damage to each creature. If this spell was cast from exile, for each opponent, choose an artifact or land that player controls. Destroy the chosen permanents.
Foretell {5}{R} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

card.name: Summon: Kujata
card.oracle_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)
I — Lightning — This creature deals 3 damage to each of up to two target creatures.
II — Ice — Up to three target creatures can't block this turn.
III — Fire — Discard a card, then draw two cards. When you discard a card this way, this creature deals damage equal to that card's mana value to each opponent.
Trample, haste

card.name: Vincent, Vengeful Atoner
card.oracle_text:
Menace
Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on Vincent.
Chaos — Whenever Vincent deals combat damage to an opponent, it deals that much damage to each other opponent if Vincent's power is 7 or greater.

card.name: Avalanche of Sector 7
card.oracle_text:
Menace
Avalanche of Sector 7's power is equal to the number of artifacts your opponents control.
Whenever an opponent activates an ability of an artifact they control, Avalanche of Sector 7 deals 1 damage to that player.

card.name: Hellkite Tyrant
card.oracle_text:
Flying, trample
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, gain control of all artifacts that player controls.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control twenty or more artifacts, you win the game.

card.name: Professional Face-Breaker
card.oracle_text:
Menace
Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, create a Treasure token.
Sacrifice a Treasure: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn.

card.name: Chaos Warp
card.oracle_text: The owner of target permanent shuffles it into their library, then reveals the top card of their library. If it's a permanent card, they put it onto the battlefield.
card.flavor_text:
"I'm getting less human..."
—Vincent Valentine

card.name: Cait Sith, Fortune Teller
card.oracle_text: Lucky Slots — At the beginning of combat on your turn, scry 1, then exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. When you exile a card this way, target creature you control gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is that card's mana value.
card.flavor_text: "I'm friend to one and all, thanks to my crystal ball!"

card.name: Vandalblast
card.oracle_text:
Destroy target artifact you don't control.
Overload {4}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")
card.flavor_text: "Danger's part of the job. Don't worry about me.

card.name: Furious Rise
card.oracle_text: At the beginning of your end step, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card until you exile another card with this enchantment.
card.flavor_text: "You guys are worthless, but my proud creation is a sure thing!"

card.name: Summoning Materia
card.oracle_text:
You may look at the top card of your library any time.
As long as this Equipment is attached to a creature, you may cast creature spells from the top of your library.
Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has vigilance and "{T}: Add {G}."
Equip {2}

card.name: Bugenhagen, Wise Elder
card.oracle_text:
Reach
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a creature with power 7 or greater, draw a card.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
card.flavor_text: "I've been thinking if there was anything we could do to help a planet already in misery..."

card.name: Lifestream's Blessing
card.oracle_text:
Draw X cards, where X is the greatest power among creatures you controlled as you cast this spell. If this spell was cast from exile, you gain twice X life.
Foretell {4}{G} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

card.name: Professor Hojo
card.oracle_text:
The first activated ability you activate during your turn that targets a creature you control costs {2} less to activate.
Whenever one or more creatures you control become the target of an activated ability, draw a card. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: Cultivate
card.oracle_text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.
card.flavor_text: "They say you can't grow grass and flowers in Midgar. But for some reason, the flowers have no trouble blooming here."

card.name: Nature's Lore
card.oracle_text: Search your library for a Forest card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
card.flavor_text:
"The spirits that return to the planet, merge with one another and roam the planet. They roam, converge, and divide, becoming a swell, called the lifestream."
—Bugenhagen

card.name: Harmonize
card.oracle_text: Draw three cards.
card.flavor_text:
"Only the Ancients, only Aerith can
save us from Meteor."
—Cloud Strife

card.name: Rampant Growth
card.oracle_text: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
card.flavor_text:
"It is up to the planet to decide. What is
best for the planet. What is bad for the
planet. All that is bad will disappear."
—Bugenhagen

card.name: Aerith, Last Ancient
card.oracle_text:
Lifelink
Raise — At the beginning of your end step, if you gained life this turn, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. If you gained 7 or more life this turn, return that card to the battlefield instead.
card.flavor_text: "Right here, right now, I need to know I did everything I could."

card.name: Red XIII, Proud Warrior
card.oracle_text:
Vigilance, trample
Other modified creatures you control have vigilance and trample. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)
Cosmo Memory — When Red XIII enters, return target Aura or Equipment card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Conformer Shuriken
card.oracle_text:
Equipped creature has "Whenever this creature attacks, tap target creature defending player controls. If that creature has greater power than this creature, put a number of +1/+1 counters on this creature equal to the difference."
Equip {2}

card.name: Wrecking Ball Arm
card.flavor_text: "I don't care what it is! I'm gonna bust him up!"

card.name: Decimate
card.oracle_text: Destroy target artifact, target creature, target enchantment, and target land. (You can't cast this spell unless you have legal choices for all its targets.)
card.flavor_text:
"Progress requires sacrifice. Learn to live with it."
—President Shinra

card.name: Champion's Helm
Arcane Signet
card.oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
card.flavor_text:
"To put it simply, the knowledge of the Ancients is sealed within each orb. That knowledge not only connects us to the planet... it allows us to tap into her power."
—Sephiroth

card.name: Barret, Avalanche Leader
card.oracle_text:
Reach
Avalanche! — Whenever an Equipment you control enters, create a 2/2 red Rebel creature token.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, attach up to one target Equipment you control to target Rebel you control.

card.name: Colossus Hammer
card.oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +10/+10 and loses flying.
Equip {8} ({8}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
card.flavor_text: "Sorry to keep you waiting. It's me! I'll handle the rest!"

card.name: Armory Automaton
card.oracle_text: Whenever this creature enters or attacks, you may attach any number of target Equipment to it. (Control of the Equipment doesn't change.)
card.flavor_text:
"They don't call those things sweepers for nothing. They can wipe out a whole squad in seconds."
—Jessie, Avalanche rebel

card.name: Barret Wallace
card.oracle_text:
Reach
Whenever Barret Wallace attacks, it deals damage equal to the number of equipped creatures you control to defending player.
card.flavor_text: "You gonna stand there and pretend you can't hear the planet crying out in pain?"

card.name: Behemoth Sledge
card.oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has trample and lifelink.
Equip {3}
card.flavor_text: A crudely reinforced baseball bat. Designed to beat the living tar out of anything and everything.

card.name: Conqueror's Flail
Darksteel Plate
card.flavor_text: "A Shinra uniform... I was so proud when I first put it on."

card.name: Explorer's Scope
card.oracle_text:
Whenever equipped creature attacks, look at the top card of your library. If it's a land card, you may put it onto the battlefield tapped.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Hero's Blade
card.oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +3/+2.
Whenever a legendary creature you control enters, you may attach this Equipment to it.
Equip {4} ({4}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Inspiring Statuary
card.oracle_text: Nonartifact spells you cast have improvise. (Your artifacts can help cast those spells. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.)
card.flavor_text:
"Man thinks very highly of himself."
—Barret Wallace

card.name: Hero's Heirloom
Lightning Greaves
card.oracle_text:
Equipped creature has haste and shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Equip {0}
card.flavor_text:
"Gotta step it up!"
—Tifa Lockhart

card.name: Mask of Memory
card.oracle_text:
Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, you may draw two cards. If you do, discard a card.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Sword of the Animist
card.flavor_text: "Don't fight here! You'll ruin the flowers!"

card.name: Sol Ring
card.oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}{C}.
card.flavor_text:
"Naturally formed materia. And look at the size of it. Astounding. For the mako energy to condense into something like this, it must have taken an eternity."
—Sephiroth

card.name: Skullclamp
card.flavor_text:
"My mother's name is Jenova... 'The Jenova Project'... is this just a coincidence?"
—Sephiroth

card.name: Trailblazer's Boots
card.oracle_text:
Equipped creature has nonbasic landwalk. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a nonbasic land.)
Equip {2}
card.flavor_text:
"The gate to tomorrow is not the light of heaven, but the darkness of the depths of the earth."
—Vincent Valentine

card.name: Ash Barrens
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
Basic landcycling {1} ({1}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)
card.flavor_text: There's a legend that tells of an ancient battle between the esper Odin and a powerful magus... It took place in the great hall of a castle.

card.name: Brushland
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {G} or {W}. This land deals 1 damage to you.
card.flavor_text:
"When Sin is defeated here, the Calm will visit Spira once more. That's why this place is now known as the Calm Lands."
—Scholar Maechen

card.name: Bonders' Enclave
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{3}, {T}: Draw a card. Activate only if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.
card.flavor_text:
"With things the way they are now, how 'bout raising a chocobo?"
—Chocobo Bill

card.name: Command Tower
card.oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
card.flavor_text:
"Thanks to the miracle of mako energy, our lives are richer and better than ever before. Mako keeps our lights on at night, and made Midgar into the city that never sleeps."
—Shinra guide

card.name: Canopy Vista
card.oracle_text:
({T}: Add {G} or {W}.)
This land enters tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.
card.flavor_text:
"This here's Mideel. It's a quiet little hot springs town. Just the perfect place for old folks like us to live out our lives."
—Mideel resident

card.name: Clifftop Retreat
card.oracle_text:
This land enters tapped unless you control a Mountain or a Plains.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.
card.flavor_text:
"Our mission is to survey a run-down reactor."
—Sephiroth

card.name: Battlefield Forge
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}. This land deals 1 damage to you.
card.flavor_text:
"Welcome to the new world order."
—Rufus Shinra

card.name: Furycalm Snarl
card.oracle_text:
As this land enters, you may reveal a Mountain or Plains card from your hand. If you don't, this land enters tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.
card.flavor_text:
"It sure helped having Cid here. I had no idea he could drive a train..."
—Red XIII

card.name: Fortified Village
card.oracle_text:
As this land enters, you may reveal a Forest or Plains card from your hand. If you don't, this land enters tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {W}.
card.flavor_text:
"We've been fighting Shinra on this battlefield for a long time. We've settled in for a long war."
—Fort Condor villager

card.name: Cinder Glade
card.oracle_text:
({T}: Add {R} or {G}.)
This land enters tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.
card.flavor_text:
"After we lost the war, we got peace, but with that, we lost something else. Now look at Wutai..."
—Yuffie Kisaragi

card.name: Evolving Wilds
card.oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice this land: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
card.flavor_text:
"Both the Crusaders and the Al Bhed truly wish peace for Spira. This Operation Miʼhen was born from that wish they share."
—Seymour Guado

card.name: Fire-Lit Thicket
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{R/G}, {T}: Add {R}{R}, {R}{G}, or {G}{G}.
card.flavor_text:
"Welcome to Wall Market, the pleasure capital of Midgar that's got everything for everybody!"
—Wall Market barker

card.name: Exotic Orchard
card.oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.
card.flavor_text:
"We have been expecting you, Lady Yuna. Welcome to Guadosalam."
—Tromell, Seymour's butler

card.name: Game Trail
card.oracle_text:
As this land enters, you may reveal a Mountain or Forest card from your hand. If you don't, this land enters tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {G}.
card.flavor_text: Many attractions await you here at the Gold Saucer. You will be moved and excited, thrilled and terrified!

card.name: Jungle Shrine
card.oracle_text:
This land enters tapped.
{T}: Add {R}, {G}, or {W}.
card.flavor_text:
"This is... the Temple of the Ancients. I know... I feel it. The knowledge of the know Ancients..."
—Aerith Gainsborough

card.name: Mossfire Valley
card.flavor_text:
"Look at this rusted rocket. I was supposed to be the first man in space with this. Everyday, it tilts a little bit more."
-—Cid Highwind

card.name: Path of Ancestry
card.oracle_text:
This land enters tapped.
{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. When that mana is spent to cast a creature spell that shares a creature type with your commander, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.)

card.name: Radiant Grove
card.oracle_text:
({T}: Add {G} or {W}.)
This land enters tapped.
card.flavor_text:
"You're not really going to see the dead, more like your memories of them. They take on the form of the dead person—an illusion, nothing else."
—Rikku

card.name: Rugged Prairie
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{R/W}, {T}: Add {R}{R}, {R}{W}, or {W}{W}.
card.flavor_text:
"Corel sure has gone to pot. It used to be a famous coal mining town! Νοw, it's nothing but a miserable pit! Me, my bulldozer... everything's out of work."
—Corel resident

card.name: Sacred Peaks
card.oracle_text:
({T}: Add {R} or {W}.)
This land enters tapped.
card.flavor_text:
"So this is the power of the Warring Triad! With this and my magicite... the world will be mine to command!"
—Emperor Gestahl

card.name: Rootbound Crag
card.oracle_text:
This land enters tapped unless you control a Mountain or a Forest.
{T}: Add {R} or {G}.
card.flavor_text:
"Did Sephiroth... do this?"
—Cloud Strife

card.name: Sunpetal Grove
card.oracle_text:
This land enters tapped unless you control a Forest or a Plains.
{T}: Add {G} or {W}.
card.flavor_text:
"I wish I could live in a place like this. Peaceful... living with a smile on my face every day."
—Yuna

card.name: Spire of Industry
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color. Activate only if you control an artifact.
card.flavor_text:
"A shining monument to corporate greed. One of these days I'm gonna tear it down and burn the rubble."
—Barret Wallace

card.name: Slayers' Stronghold
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{R}{W}, {T}: Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains vigilance and haste until end of turn.
card.flavor_text:
"Today the No. 1 Reactor was bombed. The terrorist group Avalanche has claimed responsibility for the bombing."
—President Shinra

card.name: Sungrass Prairie
card.flavor_text:
"Thinking of crossing the marshes? Hmm, then it'll probably be safer for you to get a chocobo."
—Chocobo Bill

card.name: Scavenger Grounds
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice a Desert: Exile all graveyards.
card.flavor_text: "The Burn"—-once a verdant region teeming with flora and fauna, repeated summonings saw it bled of aether and reduced to a barren desert.

card.name: Sunscorched Divide
card.flavor_text:
"You there! We're about to storm the castle. The two of you will join the assault squad. Get moving!"
-—Imperial soldier

card.name: Wooded Ridgeline
card.oracle_text:
({T}: Add {R} or {G}.)
This land enters tapped.
card.flavor_text: "Monsters instinctively target weaker prey," said Cloud. "Hmm... you'd better watch out then," Aerith teased.
